div.pre: 11 Isthmia, near Corinth, 1954 Burial: c. 480 B.C. Contents: 135 AR. From excavations; be- neath floor of Temple of Poseidon and associated fill Eretria: 1 fr. Aegina: 43 st.; 18 dr. and fr. (some pl.) Corinth: 14 st.; 12 dr.; 30 fr. (some pl.) Sicyon: 1 fr. Argos: 3 fr. Tegea: 2 fr. Naxos: 1 fr. Unc.: 10 Disposition: Old Corinth Broneer, Hesperia 1955, pp. 135-6, some illus.
